title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Inspiration Point
body: GPS Activities:   Inspiration Point - How the mountains formed!       To answer the quiz questions you will need to:  Visit Geocaching.com to learn more about this EarthCache site. Take your GPS and go on a hike to the coordinates provided at Geocaching.com. Log your find at Geocaching.com. Then, click the quiz link on Geocaching.com to return to this page where you can take the quiz and earn your Inspiration Point certificate.   Â     Please be patient while the quiz loads. Thank You!(object placeholder)
